actions.name: Illusion
actions.description: Effect: At the start of combat, or when switched in, the user is @Affliction[disguised]. While @Affliction[disguised], the user takes the forme of a random creature, or the forme of an allied creature in their team, and their default EVA stage is 1. If the user is hit by a Physical or Special-category attack they lose the @Affliction[disguised] Affliction.
